name: 100 Squares
description:
Entry for Weekly Game Jam 100 "100".

Classical board game in digital format for up to 4 players featuring an automatic play mode.

Controls:

Click while the animated dice are rolling to try to get a good number.

Autoplay: When game has started you can click on the autoplay label top-left to trigger the 1, 2, 3 or 4 players autoplay mode or switch it off.
